Write-Up Text: The people had plenty to say about Australia's Federal Budget 2023 with posts ranging from praise to skepticism. Posts touting the budget's benefits for international students Medicare and income support were common themes while warnings about potential scams and critical reactions to a budget lacking details and delivery also made the rounds. Contentious immigration rhetoric empty promises and the emergence of a "working poor" were also subjects of discussion. Overall these people on social media were expressing both excitement and uncertainty about what the budget would bring.
